hero.title: About Great Outdoors
hero.description: Discover our passion for connecting people with nature through unforgettable outdoor experiences.

children.text: Welcome to Great Outdoors, where adventure meets comfort in the heart of nature. For over a decade, we've been dedicated to providing exceptional outdoor experiences that create lasting memories for individuals, families, and groups.

Our mission is simple: to help you disconnect from the digital world and reconnect with the natural one. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat or an adrenaline-pumping adventure, we have the perfect accommodation and activity waiting for you.
Founded in 2012 by outdoor enthusiasts Sarah and Mike Thompson, Great Outdoors began as a small family business with a big dream: to share the transformative power of nature with others.

seo.metaTitle: About Great Outdoors - Your Outdoor Adventure Company
seo.metaDescription: Learn about Great Outdoors, your premier destination for outdoor adventures and nature accommodations. Connecting people with nature since 2012.
seo.keywords: about great outdoors, outdoor adventure company, nature experiences, outdoor accommodations

hero.title: Get In Touch
hero.description: Ready to plan your next outdoor adventure? We're here to help you create the perfect experience.

children.text: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're planning your first outdoor adventure or you're a seasoned explorer looking for something new, our team is here to help you create the perfect experience.

seo.metaTitle: Contact Great Outdoors - Plan Your Adventure Today
seo.metaDescription: Get in touch with Great Outdoors to plan your perfect outdoor adventure. Phone, email, and office visit options available.
seo.keywords: contact great outdoors, outdoor adventure booking, nature experience planning
